column1: '''''Ulmondil''''' ([[Quenya|Q.]] 'Friend of Ulmo') was one of the epithets of '''[[Tuor]]'''.<ref>{{WJ|West}}
column3: p. 235</ref> Tuor was a man chosen and guided by the [[Valar|Vala]] [[Ulmo]] to do great deeds
column4: and throughout his life harboured a [[sea-longing]] that eventually drove him to depart from [[Middle-earth]] in his ship [[Eärrámë]].

column1: The name contains the name [[Ulmo]] and the well known Quenya ending ''[[-ndil]]''
